key.name: <FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Community</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nClick Add Friend to befriend another adventurer.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Beauty</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nExpress yourself with new hair styles, dyes, and faces.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Taxi</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nOnce you discover a taxi stop, you can ride a taxi there from anywhere.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Auto-loot</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nYou must reach Lv. 10 to use the Auto-loot function.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Mount</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nRun as hard as you can to earn the <FONT color='#FFD200'>A True Marathoner II</FONT> trophy... and get a mount!

<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Fishing</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nVisit Pesca and complete the <FONT color='#FFD200'>First Touch</FONT> quest to receive a fishing pole. Fill your Fish Album to earn special items.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Kay's Games</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nJoin in Kay's events to earn some serious experience!
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Meret Market</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nCheck the Meret Market for hot new products.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Safe</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nStore your items and mesos in the vaults found in every town.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Emote</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nClick the button next to the chat window to use all kinds of expressive actions.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Balmy Farm</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nDefeat the pack and protect the herd!
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Guild</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nIf you're not in a guild yet, use the Search function to join one.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Maple Arcade</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nYou can enjoy a wide range of mini-games at the Maple Arcade.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Find Party</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nFind a group of adventurers to play with.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Play Instrument</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nIf you have an instrument and a music score, you can play music! Visit the Royal Music Academy to get started.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Enchantment</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nVisit enchanters to grant your equipment new powers.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Golma Apartments</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nYour help is needed to scold a very bad piggy.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Flying Balloon</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nGet a flying balloon and float effortlessly through the sky.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Dismantle</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nUse the Onyx Extractor with <FONT color='#FFD200'>a Lv. 20 or higher piece of equipment</FONT> to get an Onyx Crystal.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Black Market</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nShop for rare items you can't find anywhere else.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Shadow Gate</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nThe Land of Darkness lies beyond the ominous Shadow Gate.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Real Estate</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nIf you own property, you can manage it here. If you don't have any property yet, why not try a starter home in Evansville?

<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Assistant</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nHired assistants for your house can craft items for you. Visit Tabatha in Tria to hire assistants for mesos. You can also hire assistants from the Meret Market.
Lumiwind Airship\n \nThe Lumiwind can take you straight to Karkar Island.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Daily Quests</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nComplete daily quests in Queenstown and Ludari City to earn mesos and rue.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Blue Stars</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nGather blue stars and use them to purchase various items from the Starkeepers.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Red Stars</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nGather red stars and use them to purchase various items from the Starkeepers.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Twisted Pocket Realm</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nFace the forces of evil head-on deep within the Land of Darkness.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>특성</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\n특성을 배워 캐릭터의 능력을 강화할 수 있습니다.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Gemstones</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nEquip gemstones to power up your equipment.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Job Rank</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nAfter reaching level 60, you can begin a quest to increase your job rank.

<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Lapenshards</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nAfter completing your job rank quest, speak with Lanemone at the Frontier Foundation. After completing her quests, you'll be able to harness the awesome power of lapenshards.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Job Rank</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nAfter reaching level 60, you can begin a quest to increase your job rank.

<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Lapenshards</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nAfter completing your job rank quest, speak with Lanemone at the Frontier Foundation. After completing her quests, you'll be able to harness the awesome power of lapenshards.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Maple Workshop</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nCreate various UGC items at the Maple Workshop.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Exploration Goals</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nOpen the World Map to view exploration goals.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Guild Mini-Games</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nPlay mini-games with your guild.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Guild Quest</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nYou can participate in guild quests after joining a guild.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Guild House</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nUpgrade the guild house to unlock various features.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Club</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nYou can create a club with friends with the same interests.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Life Skill Gathering</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nUtilize Life Skills to gather various items.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Life Skill Crafts</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nUtilize Life Skills to craft various items.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Life Skill Leisure</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nUtilize Life Skills to obtain useful items.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>생활 기술 마법부여</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\n생활 기술을 통하여 가치 높은 아이템을 획득할 수 있습니다.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Guild Raid: Xenon System</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nYou can participate in guild dungeons after joining a guild.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Master Skill</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nAfter reaching level 70, you can begin a quest to learn master skills.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Kritias</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nTalk to the Lumiwind Pilot in Tria after reaching Lv. 70 to go to Kritias.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Legion Battle</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nA legion battle begins at the 50-minute mark of every hour. Join in the fight to defend Kritias!
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Gigantica</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nGigantica appears whenver the gigantic drill is activated. Use the gigantic drill battery to start the drill.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Daily Quests</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nComplete daily quests in Queenstown and Ludari City to earn mesos and rue.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Blue Stars</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nGather blue stars and use them to purchase various items from the Starkeepers.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Red Stars</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nGather red stars and use them to purchase various items from the Starkeepers.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Daily Quests</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nComplete daily quests in Queenstown and Ludari City to earn mesos and rue.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Maple Arena</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nTest your skills against other players! Battle to your heart's content in the Maple Arena.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Blue Stars</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nGather blue stars and use them to purchase various items from the Starkeepers.
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15'>Red Stars</FONT>\n<FONT size='3'> </FONT>\nGather red stars and use them to purchase various items from the Starkeepers.
